fields.name: Hunza Valley
fields.description: Hunza Valley is a mountainous valley in the Gilgit-Baltistan region of Pakistan. The valley is situated at an elevation of 2,438 meters, surrounded by snow-capped peaks including Rakaposhi, Ultar Sar, and Ladyfinger Peak.

fields.name: Fairy Meadows
fields.description: Fairy Meadows, named by German climbers and locally known as Joot, is a grassland near Nanga Parbat base camp. Its spectacular beauty and accessibility make it one of the most popular tourist destinations in Pakistan.

fields.name: Faisal Mosque
fields.description: The Faisal Mosque is the national mosque of Pakistan, located in the capital city Islamabad. It is one of the largest mosques in the world and an iconic symbol of Pakistani architecture.

fields.name: Badshahi Mosque
fields.description: The Badshahi Mosque in Lahore is one of the most iconic landmarks of Pakistan, built in 1673 during the Mughal era. It is the second largest mosque in Pakistan and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

fields.name: Baltit Fort
fields.description: The Baltit Fort in Hunza is an ancient fort dating back 700 years. Restored by the Aga Khan Trust for Culture, it's a remarkable example of local architecture and offers stunning views of the Hunza Valley.

fields.name: Deosai Plains
fields.description: Known as the Land of Giants, Deosai Plains is the second highest plateau in the world. Located in Gilgit-Baltistan, it's a biodiversity hotspot and home to unique wildlife including the Himalayan brown bear.

fields.name: Hunza Dried Apricots
fields.description: Organic dried apricots from the Hunza Valley, known for their exceptional taste and nutritional value.

fields.name: Swat Valley Shawl
fields.description: Handcrafted wool shawl made by local artisans in Swat Valley, featuring traditional patterns and designs.

fields.name: Gilgit Handicraft Box
fields.description: Decorative wooden box with intricate hand-carved designs, made by skilled craftsmen in Gilgit.

fields.name: Deluxe Camping
fields.description: Luxury camping with amenities and guided setup

fields.name: Private Car Transfer
fields.description: Round trip private car transfer from airport

fields.name: Local Bus Service
fields.description: Public transportation pass for the duration of stay

fields.name: Premium Dining Experience
fields.description: Three meals including fine dining experiences

fields.name: Guided Valley Tour
fields.description: Full day guided tour of Hunza Valley with lunch

fields.name: Cultural Show

fields.name: Local Crafts Package
